page.title: 14PEOPLE IN DRAYCOTT
page.content: 702 ELECTORS LIVE IN {DRAYCOTT}.OF THE MAIN WAGE EARNER IN EACH HOUSEHOLD 99 WORK AWAY FROM THE VILLAGE 70 ARE RETIRED,68 WORK IN, OR ARE VILLAGE BASED AND 5 UNEMPLOYED. A RANDOM{ {SURVEY}OF {SHOPPING}HABITS SHOWED MOST SHOP WEEKLY, BULK SHOPPING AWAY FROM THE VILLAGE MAINLY DRIVING TO {WELLS} ONLY {ONE} TRAVELLING BY{BUS.}THE VILLAGE SHOPS ARE USED FOR SECONDARY PURCHASES.{ENTERTAINMENT} IS MAINLY VILLAGE BASED ALTHOUGH THEATRE,CINEMA,CONCERTS AND SPORTS CENTRES ARE VISITED. {WELLS}IS USED MAINLY WITH {WESTON}AND {BRISTOL}CLOSE SECONDS. CHILDREN GO TO {CHEDDAR}FOR CLUBS AND SWIMMING. DRAYCOTT HAS W.I., FOOTBALL,CRICKET AND REGULAR WHIST DRIVES. THE ELDERLY HAVE A CLUB AND MOTHERS WITH YOUNG CHILDREN AND THE P.T.A. ORGANISES SOCIAL FUNCTIONS. { }
